name: stylesnprofiles
description: A nostalgic web application that brings NASA's vast collection of space data to life through an authentic Apple System 6 interface. This full-stack application seamlessly integrates modern web technologies with retro computing aesthetics to create an engaging educational platform for space enthusiasts.

scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:server:unit && npm run test:client:unit
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.format:all: npm run format && cd client && npm run format && cd ../server && npm run format
scripts.validate: npm run lint:all && npm run format:all && npm run test
